Hello,
I saw an earlier post in the archives about this and I'm running into 
the same problem. I'm using Kawa v5.0 Enterprise Edition. For the 
past two weeks I've been using JUnit 3.2 successfully in Kawa v5.0 
(and v4.0). Today I upgraded to JUnit 3.5. When I replace the 3.2 
junit.jar with the 3.5 junit.jar and try to run my TestSuite I get 
the following:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Cannot instantiate test case: 
testDocumentDoesntMatchDTD

for every testXXXX method in my TestCase class. For grins, I tried 
putting the 3.4 junit.jar (courtesy of Xerces 1.3.0) in there and I'm 
still getting the same error. 

One more thing, I know JUnit is reaching my TestCase class because 
it's finding all the textXXX methods. All these methods are:

public void testXXXXX() {
  // do something
}

Anyone have any ideas what's going on?

-ryan
subject: Kawa and JUnit problems
